facts: I've developed a serious game about nutrition called Defensa a Bocados (Defense by bites in english).
My best code is written while listening to Bad Bunny in the background.
I'm motivated by creating solutions that generate real impact in people's lives.
If I don’t understand something, I research it until I can explain it in simple terms.
Every project is an excuse to learn something I haven’t mastered yet.
This portfolio is inspired by public transportation, especially train systems.
Ever since I started building websites, I knew this was my thing.
I believe creativity is just as important as technical skills.
This landing page is composed of 8 components.
I’m not afraid to redo something if I know it can be better.
I usually organize my ideas on paper, sketching drafts until I’m satisfied with the concept.
I find it fascinating how technology has evolved over time and how essential it has become in our lives.
Just like programming, I’m passionate about music and video games.
Well-designed technology can make complex processes feel simple.
I love puzzle games! I currently have a streak in Queens, Zip, and Tango on LinkedIn.
My highest rank in Overwatch has been Platinum 3.
